docs: cozy , comfy room , great location .glad this year to see some additions to the breakfast menu .always a welcoming staff . </DOC> they apologized profusely and gave us another room .this time the front desk staff did n't waste anytime and upgraded us immediately to a suite .and we appreciate the desk staff for making the decision quickly .later the staff told us the people in the rooms did n't check out as expected and no one followed up . </DOC> very quiet hotel even though its close to freeway .property has been renovated nicely and very clean .very delicious complementary hot breakfast with lots of choices .would definitely recommend this hotel !several restaurants close to hotel . </DOC> the room was spacious and comfortable , and we did not mind the outside room entrance and being on the second floor .overall , it was an average place to stay . </DOC> 10 of my friends , my bf and i stayed here during a barrel tasting event in northern sonoma .: we found this place to be a great value .the staff is very nice and friendly .the price of the rooms are very reasonable .the rooms are very clean , nice , updated and cozy .the rooms are not big but space is adequate .the rooms come with refrigerator , microwave , coffee maker .tv is decent .as a matter of fact , the hotel is very quiet .the towels are decent .the sheets are clean and in good condition .the bed is very comfortable .the location of the hotel could n't be any better .the pillows are very bulky and not comfortable .the hard boiled eggs at breakfast were mushy and disgusting .the pancakes are so - so . </DOC> stayed here for one night : liked the courtyard with it well maintained garden .in the garden there is a sitting area where one can meet with friends or simply sit and watch the birds .our room was on the 2nd floor , it was very clean, the shower was powerful , we slept soundly and we were not troubled by any noise .the morning breakfast was quite good , the staff refilled dish trays before trays became empty .they made the scramble eggs which were quite good , plenty of ingredients included in the eggs .i had three cups of coffee as they offered real cream not the powdery stuff .the breakfast had a steady flow of customers but the staff kept everything clean and responded immediately to requests . </DOC> this was not a great / good hotel .room was small and had a musty smell .beds were very small .carpets dirty and our tub was not clean .fixtures in restroom were rusty and walls were damaged .had troubles with internet connection too .we will never stay here again . </DOC> in the first stay we had a second floor room with a balcony overlooking the garden area and the second stay we had a first floor room with a patio next to the swimming pool .both stays we had no noise , tasty breakfast , comfortable room .on our second stay we parked in front of our room , and our room was located close to the breakfast room .we always make reservations a week or two before arrival , and try to arrive at the hotel between 2 & 3 pm ( to avoid the commute traffic ) .and our goal is to checkout between 9 & 10 am .all staff were friendly , accommodating and strived to make the hotel clean , comfortable and have the guest glad that they stayed here .they succeed with us .
summary: i enjoyed the variety of food from the buffet , the fish .my recommended two places visited with me and walk dark at the top which was hustled to feed the ducks and spotted a picnic club at the bar .if i had paid up here i would stay here again .there are very few décor around the site and the trim on the table where the entrance is and the redirected in a area .</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
